website_summaries.verdict: A little of this formula goes a long way, even on dogs with longer hair. It may note replace baths in your home, but it will help you reduce their frequency. No toxic ingredients, and does a great job of deodorizing your dog as well.
pros: Mild, safe, and beneficial for sensitive skin
Does not contain any harsh chemicals or laureth sulfate
Does not interfere with topical flea treatments
removes odor rather than masking it
Seems to work on longer hair
cons: May not replace a bath, especially if the dog is very dirty, but it makes his coat shiny and gets rid of the "wet dog" smell
Some users complain the scent is stronger than they prefer

customer_reviews.title: My Golden and I are true believers....
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a little sceptical about products that advertise such marvelous results. I asked my Golden Retriever's groomer for an idea for something to "run interference" between her visits and she said that she was thinking about trying this product but she hadn't used it yet. I thought that was good enough for us to give it a try. 5 Stars! 6 if they had them. This is a great product! It does everything that they say it does and you don't have to use half a bottle. Nikki my Golden and I are true believers.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer  Dahne1004

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have a senior Belgian Malinois who happens to be a retired police dog. He is losing his ability to get around, so he is also a bit incontinent. But bathing him every day is not practical, especially since it's getting cold! I had been using the wipes, which work, but are very expensive and time consuming. The spray is quick, effective, and smells great! Ranger LOVES getting his rub down while I work it into his coat, and I incorporate a deep tissue muscle massage in at the same time. It has actually helped him get up and around more often, because I think it helps him feel better. And he looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Candance McGee

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: This is a lifesaver! I take my large dog out often (dog parks, outdoor malls, dog beaches, hiking, etc) and it can be difficult to keep her clean and smelling good between baths. This product helps SO much! The smell is alright, nothing flowery or perfume like, and it is easy to apply, rub, and air-dry. Even after a crazy hiking day, spraying this on her makes her feel like a (85%) clean dog! Nothing beats a bath, but this is great for between times when it just isn't possible. We have probably used this about 5 times for her full body and still have some left over! So it lasts a while.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Another great product from Pawstruck
customer_reviews.text: We have basset hounds. They get "groomed" every four to six weeks, but if you've ever owned a basset hound, you know they start to smell "houndy" before grooming time. This product is easy to use and makes our houndy girls smell great. Even better because one of the dogs has skin issues and the ingredients in this stuff really helps ease itching, scratching, and skin breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: Former Marine or his wife

customer_reviews.title: I AM PAWSTRUCK!
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered another bottle - that's how much I like using this on my rescue - she's afraid of water (think hurricanes) and this turned out to be the best alternative. It does exactly what it says it does. And I use is frequently.
customer_reviews.author: HBCACLO

customer_reviews.title: Keeps fresh between baths, smells good
customer_reviews.text: My puppy is disabled and can't walk. Potty training has proven to be difficult. This helps when he has an accident without his belly band and to keep him clean when he does wear the belly band as his hair around there gets gross and stinky. This has been a great product to keep him smelling fresh between baths. I have used another brand and like this one better. Only 4 stars because it seems to leave his hair kind of sticky and feels like it has a slight residue. But so did the other brand. I am very sensitive to smells, cleaners and products with asthma reactions. . This does not bother me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kfox

customer_reviews.title: Smells fresh, Bag leaked
customer_reviews.text: The bottle arrived in a large padded envelope. Inside the envelope was a clear plastic bag that contained the bottle and then the separate nozzle to attach. The bottle was leaking when I got it so the clear plastic bag was soaked and it leaked out onto the padded envelope. Not the best way to receive a first time purchase but the product smells clean and fresh.
customer_reviews.author: TDC

customer_reviews.title: Product works as promised.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in a timely manner and works as described. Not sure how long one application will last as just put it on my dog today. Would have given it five stars if not for the scent. It is a very "heavy" (for lack of a better term) citrus scent. If I purchase again, it would have to be a different scent.
customer_reviews.author: Schatten

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell! We live in the country and our dogs get dirty and stinky. This worked like a charm - it is too cold to bathe the dogs at the moment but this seems to help until we are able to bathe them. Arrived on time, didn't leak. Win Win!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley D. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Really Works
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. We have a very energetic, playful 4 month old westie. She loves rolling in the dirt on a daily basis. We don't like to completely bathe her everyday. So this spray is perfect until we can get her to the groomer. Our pup comes out very white, which we love. Even if it is only for a short time. Some of the reviews state the citrus is strong. We however, did not find it that strong. We love this product and will continue to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: sbanner

customer_reviews.title: This shampoo smells nice and I think is pretty good
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo smells nice and I think is pretty good. I used it last night on my dog after she got back from day care. After spraying her and wiping her down she dried off and definitely smelled better. It will not eliminate odors but if you aren't able to give your dog a bath this is probably the next best thing.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: It did the trick!
customer_reviews.text: It did the trick. My dog often goes through this plant in my parent's backyard that smells like throw-up...needless to say this took care of the smell without having to give a full bath. It's great because we visit my parents a lot and having to bathe my dog every week was just not an option.
customer_reviews.author: L. Walters

customer_reviews.title: Great waterless wash!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product as my senior dog can no longer go to the groomer... it is gentle for body washing him and the accidents he has. It appears not to irritate him and has a very nice smell. I have recommended to friends and family.... this company makes quality products.
customer_reviews.author: karen I

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love this dry shampoo. My big baby was just neutered and using this wash really came in handy while he is between baths. Thanks for a great, very effective product.
customer_reviews.author: R.C. Driver

customer_reviews.title: If Your Dogs Hate "Real Baths"....
customer_reviews.text: It worked and I liked that it's natural and allows us to spread the "real baths" out a bit further (our dogs hate to get wet or showered). It serves that purpose. It is - maybe that's obvious - not a replacement for a real bath. It did help make them smell good for a few days and we'd buy it again with that expectation.
customer_reviews.author: StephanTX

customer_reviews.title: Smells good, sprayer needs some work.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my hound dog who HATES water. She kind of tolerates sprays in small quantities. Smells great! However....the sprayer does not work well. I had to transfer to another bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Nursey Nurse

customer_reviews.title: Works well and smells terrific!
customer_reviews.text: I like my boy to look good and smell great, so I can bury my face in his soft baby fine hair but not sneeze. This seems to do the trick of grabbing dander that he picks up daily. Just spray, work in with your fingers, and brush out. It dries quickly and really smells nice and fresh! My nose has stopped running, which is a plus!
customer_reviews.author: annacolleen

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Anyone with a male Italian Greyhound needs this shampoo. I got this shampoo to spot clean legs and feet and it really does the job. I use this "Shampoo for Dogs" for in-between baths. Nothing worse than a smelly little dog.
customer_reviews.author: KennelMom

customer_reviews.title: Great leave in Shampoo for you fur babies
customer_reviews.text: Being that it's winter time, and too cold to wash my dogs as they need to go outside often to use the bathroom, I am very pleased to come across this product. Seems to work well. No more doggy smell.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Tedder

customer_reviews.title: It works for a puppy who hates to take a bath
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our little princess. She smells good and her fur is so soft. We spray it on a soft wash cloth and rub her all over. Then she flips on her back and we have to clean her tummy. So cute.
customer_reviews.author: monab ... Carpe diem

customer_reviews.title: I like this product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, but I'm not sure it's any more or less effective than lemongrass essential oil mixed with distilled water and apple cider vinegar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just Ok
customer_reviews.text: Not the same as giving a bath. I did not see any before and after difference. Sent was a little over the top to me but not to unpleasant..
customer_reviews.author: george

customer_reviews.title: Does the job; smell is a bit strong
customer_reviews.text: This works well, but neither my dogs nor I enjoy using it, as the smell is a little powerful. However, it doesn't really linger.
customer_reviews.author: AJP

customer_reviews.title: nice smell
customer_reviews.text: So far i like it. I Have a very elderly dog and this was the best option because he’s not able to get in and out of the tub to be bathed. So far I am pleased with the smell and it makes him look refreshed
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Smells nice too!
customer_reviews.text: I like to use natural products as much as possible and this one is very nice. I also used the last bottle of this product to make a mister to spray the kennel with by leaving about 2 tablespoons of product in bottle and topping off with water. It freshens our indoor bedtime kennel for our often outdoor dog. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Deb B.

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Really works! Dog's coat looks and smells clean. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Cochise

customer_reviews.title: It’s nice that I found a simple way to clean him ...
customer_reviews.text: My puppy has white paws and loves mud. It’s nice that I found a simple way to clean him off, and make his paws white again, for special events
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with the shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product! And the dogs don't seem to mind it after that first startling spray!!! They smell clean and fresh now!
customer_reviews.author: JCat

customer_reviews.title: This dry shampoo is a great way to clean him between grooming
customer_reviews.text: My long haired Pyrenees loves to dig. This dry shampoo is a great way to clean him between grooming. It is easy to use and really helps his coat look shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Meditation Lover

customer_reviews.title: This is Great!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice product, it works well. I love it. My dog was happy and smells better. Thanks much!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Paula Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Not good on super fluffy dogs
customer_reviews.text: The nozzle was broken when we got it and we couldn’t get it to spray. We finally found one compatible and swapped it out only to find that it doesn’t really clean the dogs at all. Not good on our shiba inus. Fine for our Pitbull.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Barr

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: It works well for spot cleaning and general destinking Buddy between baths. It has a pleasant but not overwhelming odor. I'll buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lee B

customer_reviews.title: I used this product on our senior Lab and are pleased with the performance
customer_reviews.text: Greetings, I used this product on our senior Lab and are pleased with the performance. It added life to the dry fir, and really helped to eliminate the older dog odor. Very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Siverson

customer_reviews.title: Great product and I love that it is all natural
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product definitely a 5 paws up! Great product easy to use and the service from Pawstruck is pawsome!!!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Johnson

customer_reviews.title: She smells great
customer_reviews.text: Our dog seems to be shedding less, hair coat is soft and she smells great. Nice to use when our weather is not conducive to outside bathing.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey8721

customer_reviews.title: Let hope it will help wish  me luck
customer_reviews.text: I hope that this will work for my little guy he hates water and pulls his hair out
customer_reviews.author: Jeana Tare

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: My female Golden Retriever has thick and dense feathering. This rinse free shampoo is perfect to use on her rear feathers inbetween her baths. Pleasant lemongrass smell.
customer_reviews.author: luvgoldens

customer_reviews.title: Lame.
customer_reviews.text: I have a dachshund and I try not to bathe him too often but because he's a hound, he has a odor so I tried this and noticed no difference at all. Barely smells like anything. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alanna

customer_reviews.title: Awfullest
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much hairspray for dogs that smell like lemons!! Coat smells like lemons and is basically hairspray!
customer_reviews.author: wareagle

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I used it on my dog, he has a broken leg and has a cast on.
customer_reviews.author: cc chase

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Anything for my four legged buddy, they have no problem
customer_reviews.author: Lori  P.

customer_reviews.title: Keep your doggie smelling and looking clean and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: It’s essential oils,smells great and easy to use. Amy feels fantastic,just look at her. Lucky me!
customer_reviews.author: gracemarie serafina

customer_reviews.title: Easy fast cleaning
customer_reviews.text: A great product. My puppy loves to roll on the grass and comes back in stinky😟. This product is so good in keeping her smelling fresh and clean after one of her rolls! Recommend highly!
customer_reviews.author: veena singh

customer_reviews.title: Amazon please make this product available again
customer_reviews.text: Great product but it hasn’t been available from Amazon for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Dave M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent priduct
customer_reviews.text: My dog has a broken leg and I was unable to bathe her for a looong time! Hanoi was very helpful in keeping my princess smelling and feeling pretty and clean
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great smell for my bulldog
customer_reviews.text: Any bulldog owner knows that they have a natural stink. LOL. This stuff works great in between real baths.
customer_reviews.author: Poe Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a dog who hates baths! Scent is very subtle, product is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: allen w wolf, Linda Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time ordering this product... it works great! Smells great too!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Raatz

customer_reviews.title: Yummmmmm!
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell of this! So glad I don’t have to bathe my dogs as much since they have super sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Breshears

customer_reviews.title: No shampoo in the bottle
customer_reviews.text: When I received this product. It was totally empty. It leaked out somehow. I sent it back for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Alllen

customer_reviews.title: Cleans really good
customer_reviews.text: Cleans the dirt off the dog nicely but scent doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.author: sola

customer_reviews.title: Good product for inbetween touch-ups!
customer_reviews.text: It did a pretty good job in between baths for my lab. It could be a little stronger scented. Maybe she’s just too stinky😊
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: very simple review. It is a great smelling product. I found that for my dog it helped her with her dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: G Block

customer_reviews.title: Scent
customer_reviews.text: The scent is too strong can't use it as much as I was hoping
customer_reviews.author: Eric Berry

customer_reviews.title: Happy Hoomans 😊
customer_reviews.text: Smells good 👍 Easy to use ✔ Plant based ingredients 🐶
customer_reviews.author: margaret m.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this now, you won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. I’ve bought other products from Pawstruck and this is just as good. I have an Australian Shepherd and bathing him is a nightmare. When he smells or gets dirty at the park, I spray the dry shampoo onto a towel and work it into his coat. It leaves him smelling great and is exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: ggosselin

customer_reviews.title: It does have a nice smell to it
customer_reviews.text: Shipping arrived as stated. Product as stated. It does have a nice smell to it. Now, we will see how it works after the dog rolls in fresh deer poo. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Clean feeling; not too perfumy!
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this for my Golden Retriever. She gets a bath about every 2-3 weeks, but sometimes she just needs to freshen up. I've used dry shampoos on myself before, and let me say, this isn't exactly like a human's dry shampoo... first off, it's wet, and stays on wet until it dries naturally... secondly, it doesn't leave my dog's fur feeling like it's been cleaned to the point of having no oil left in her fur. Thankfully, it's also not too fragrant. My wife and I despise perfumes, scented candles, etc., so this product is 'lite' enough to smell pleasant without smelling like we just sprayed our dog with Fabreeze, if that makes sense.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Glaser

customer_reviews.title: great stuff
customer_reviews.text: easy to use, great smell, and easy on, easy off - I used this after the dogs played in the creek, so they were still wet, and it completely eliminated that creek water smell (we live in a suburban area). I simply had to towel them dry after application just as I would anyway. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: kaay

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shampoo for my 8-year old havanese/corgi mix. I expected to use this for in-between baths. However, after only one use, I noticed my dog's coat seemed dull and dry. I will not be using this again.
customer_reviews.author: sales4natic

customer_reviews.title: Great smell, but sprayer doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Got our bottle and set it up intending to use on my dog. However, the sprayer will not work. It will not pull fluid up through the feed line in the bottle. Disappointed - I can still use the product by pouring it onto a washcloth & then rubbing my dog, but it’ll use twice as much.
customer_reviews.author: Melody DeKorte

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised
customer_reviews.text: The product is easy to apply. My dog smelled much better after using it. I picked the citrus fragrance--so my dog smells like a piece of polished furniture--but that's an improvement over his previous odor!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Windham

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant smell
customer_reviews.text: Has a pleasant smell and doesn’t bother the dogs smell senses. Win win in my book. A little goes a long way if you wet a rag then spray a couple of times before applying to your pet.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Y

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: The citrus scent is very strong so if you don’t like the smell of orange then I suggest you look for something else. It did leave my dog’s hair soft.
customer_reviews.author: IVF Mommy

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: didn't make my dog smell good for more than an hour. don't really know if it should even be considered 'shampoo'. unknown if it actually cleans them.
customer_reviews.author: Anders

customer_reviews.title: Time saver
customer_reviews.text: Great for when you dont want to or don't have to give your dog a full bath. Cleans and softens coat with a nice scent.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly A. Marean

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Nice shampoo! Very easy to use and did a great job. My dog has anal gland issues and often needs his backside to be cleaned and this makes it so much easier than putting him in the bathtub every time.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Levy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the fresh citrus scent and this product does a great job at cleaning my dog since it’s extremely hard to bath her. I will buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Jewels

customer_reviews.title: A life saver
customer_reviews.text: This makes life so much easier for me and my dogs
customer_reviews.author: Melissa L Pack

customer_reviews.title: Like that it's all natural
customer_reviews.text: Works well with my Jack Russell terrier. Like that it's all natural. Wish it came in different scents.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: It keeps him smelling nice between baths
customer_reviews.text: This was a lifesaver for when we got our new dog. It keeps him smelling nice between baths.
customer_reviews.author: rachel2692

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Works great on a smelly Lab that likes to roll in stinky stuff
customer_reviews.author: Cathy  Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my dirty pup nice and clean
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my dirty pup nice and clean. I use it after runs and hikes and it makes it seem like I gave him a full bath! Keeps his coat / skin soft and not dry as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice smell but isn’t long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Fresh smell doesn’t last long and you have to use lots of product to make any difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Another great Pawstruck product!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! My dogs skin gets dry with too many baths, so this one is great for when she gets dirty in between bath days! Smells nice, too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Assembly Required
customer_reviews.text: This product needs to be sprayed on the dog and then wiped off. The liquid is poured into the spray bottle, which comes with the liquid. Easy enough except you have to assemble the sprayer. There are 4 parts to the sprayer and I have no idea how to put them together, even though I looked at several bottles in my kitchen. Followup.....I contacted the Pawstruck people. They sent me a new bottle with sprayer that doesn't have to be assembled. Happy with the way they handled the problem The product smells wonderful and I intend to use it frequently
customer_reviews.author: sewall29

customer_reviews.title: Contains citronella and citrus. Dog Hates it.
customer_reviews.text: I should have paid more attention to the ingredients before I purchased this. It contains citronella, which can be poisonous to animals, and citrus oil. Dogs generally don't like the smell of either. My dog acts fearful and shies away when I try to use it on her, even when I spray it on a paper towel first instead of spraying her directly. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: PCLoadLetter

customer_reviews.title: Pump did not work.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived yesterday but the spray pump doesn’t work. I replaced it with one I had. I’ll update results later
customer_reviews.author: Kimc

product_meta.title: Shampoo for Dogs | Natural & Made in USA | Safe & Effective for Puppies & Pets | Powerful to Clean, Bathe, Freshen, Remove Odors
product_meta.description: Size:Dry ShampooPawstruck No-Rinse Shampoo for Dogs & Cats Our pet shampoo gives you the ease of dry shampoo with the power of conditioning body wash. Have a stinky dog and no time to give them a bath? Pawstruck’s no-rinse formula gives you an easy, waterless shampoo experience. Great for between regular baths, on the go, after surgery, on your senior pet or puppy, and for animals that don’t like water or can’t get wet. Can even be used on cats, rabbits, ferrets, and other furry pets! Ingredients Chosen With A Purpose Formulated with plant-based ingredients in a safe formula that is equal to or more effective than non-green alternatives. Rosemary smells great and is a great germ-fighter. Ginger simultaneously helps to neutralize odor-causing germs. This blend of paraben-free ingredients is perfect for cleaning your furry friend, leaving you with a healthy-looking dog. Directions Shake well before using. Spray coat liberally. Wipe the treated area with a damp cloth, working well into fur. For a tear-free shampoo experience when cleaning the head and face, spray onto a damp cloth and apply. Allow to dry, brush and groom as usual. Repeat process for heavily soiled or smelly areas.
feature_bullets: With a gentle citrus scent, our formula works for ALL SKIN TYPES, ALL FUR TYPES AND HAIR. Perfect for sensitive skin. Balanced formula for all breeds. Soothes itchy and inflamed skin with no need for water, a bath, or a shower.

100% safe, MADE IN THE USA and free of MEA, DEA, Phosphates, Sulfates, Parabens and artificial colors. Perfect for between trips to the groomer, and dogs or cats who dislike bathing. Use on your pet's entire body including his or her face and paws.

Naturally deodorizing ingredients REMOVE SMELLY ODOR-CAUSING GERMS and leave your stinky doggie happy and clean. Our best in class cleansing spray helps maintain a shiny coat and soft fur. The best choice—easy and no need to rinse!

Truly NATURAL, BIODEGRADABLE, AND CRUELTY FREE. Non-GMO, vegan, vegetarian, and comes in recyclable packaging. This body wash is okay to use with topical flea and tick treatments and safe for puppies and kittens. Simply spray and wipe leaving behind a pleasant fragrance.

At Pawstruck, we want you to be 100% satisfied with your purchase. That’s why we stand behind our 30-day SATISFACTION GUARANTEE. If this isn’t the best no wash grooming shampoo you’ve ever purchased, our customer care team is ready to help.
